meta.name: Google Sheets
meta.details:
Show data updates, and charts from your Google Sheets directly on your screens.

Simply publish your sheet to the web, paste the embed code, and add it to the app. You can display an entire document, a single sheet, or a chart. For individual sheets, use Cell Range to control what’s visible. Add a custom Title Bar to label your content, and adjust the Zoom % to fit your screen.

Note: Google updates published sheets about every 5 minutes.

code.title: Embed Code*
code.help: Use the embed code from File → Share → Publish to web. Google refreshes the embed every 5 min.

cellsRange.title: Cells Range
cellsRange.help: Applies only when the embed code is for a specific sheet (not an entire document or chart).

sheetTitle.title: Sheet Title
sheetTitle.help: Add a custom title bar at the top of the screen

zoom.title: Zoom %
zoom.help: Adjust zoom to make the content fit the screen

objects.script_code:
pause(1)
type("""#login-email""" , """{{email|default:'a@b.c'|safe|addslashes}}""")
pause(1)
type("""#login-password""" , """{{password|default:'password'|safe|addslashes}}""")
pause(1)
runScript("""
document.querySelector('#login-email').dispatchEvent(new Event("input", { bubbles: true }))
document.querySelector('#login-password').dispatchEvent(new Event("input", { bubbles: true }))
""")
clickAndWait("""[type=submit]""")
openAndWait("""{{url|default:'https://app.cumul.io/home/login'}}""")
repeat(0){
  pause({{refresh|default:180}})
  refreshAndWait()
  waitForPageLoad()
  extract("""#dashboard-inner-container""")
  runScript("""
     j('#dashboard-inner-container').css({"height":"100%","display":"flex","align-items":"center","justify-content":"center"});
  """)
}

objects.name: Planner
objects.details: Enhance your digital signage with Microsoft Planner. Display grids, boards, charts, or schedules directly on your screens to boost project management and team collaboration. Showcase real-time tasks and track team progress using visual task boards. Simply add your email, password, and preferred Planner link to get started. When used with interactive screens, teams can update tasks and make changes directly, streamlining collaboration and productivity.

meta.name: Teams Live (Townhall)
meta.details:
The Teams Live (Townhall) app enables you to broadcast Microsoft Teams Meetings and Townhall events seamlessly on digital signage screens, making it easy to share important live sessions with larger audiences in common areas or remote locations.
Important Notes:
Teams Meetings: Supports both private and public links. Ensure that private links grant the necessary access permissions to the Teams account associated with the signage.
Townhall Events: Only supports public links. Ensure the Townhall event link is publicly accessible for successful streaming on your screens.

objects.script_code:
pause(1)
type("""#username_field""" , """{{email|default:'a@b.c'|safe|addslashes}}""")
pause(1)
type("""#password_field""" , """{{password|default:'password'|safe|addslashes}}""")
pause(1)
runScript("""
 document.querySelector('#username_field').dispatchEvent(new Event("input", { bubbles: true }))
 document.querySelector('#password_field').dispatchEvent(new Event("input", { bubbles: true }))
""")
clickAndWait(""".zenkit-button-login""")
openAndWait("""{{url|default:'https://zenkit.com'}}""")
pause(2)
runScript("""
  j('.zenkit-navigation-bar-left, .zenkit-navigation-bar-right').hide();
 """)
repeat(0){
 pause({{refresh|default:180}})
 refreshAndWait()
 waitForPageLoad()
 runScript("""
  j('.zenkit-navigation-bar-left, .zenkit-navigation-bar-right').hide();
 """)
}

date_format.help: Choose your file's date format.
date_format.title: Csv's date format

csv.title: Birthday Csv File
csv.help:
Instructions:
You can create a txt file and save it as CSV having inside the following format:
1986-12-25,John Doe
1957-02-15,Jane Doe
Otherwise, from an excel file having in the 1st column the birthdates and in the 2nd column the names, export it as CSV.

Note: Since the app appears only the dates when there is a birthday to be displayed, you can test it by adding a fake birthdate the current day.

meta.name: Weather Wall
meta.details:
Bring your screens to life with real-time weather.
Display temperature, real feel, air quality, wind direction, visibility, and more. Built for both full-screen and layout use, Weather Wall keeps teams, visitors, and guests informed at a glance with live, local conditions.

Personalize it to fit your space with your preferred language, date, and time format.
Choose your theme:
  • Animation Theme: Dynamic backgrounds that change with the weather outside.
  • Classic Theme: Full control over colors and background.
  • Glass Theme: Curated, elegant designs created by us for a modern look.

Note: Weather Wall is optimized for full-screen display. You can also use it in a layout — just make sure it has enough space to appear clearly.

meta.name: Taggbox display
meta.description: Display social media walls with Taggbox display
meta.details:
Display social media walls from your Taggbox account by providing the Display Wall URL.
Notes: Taggbox display is a 3rd-party service that helps you create and publish user generated content like social media walls across different marketing touchpoints.<% if(window.whitelabel=='yodeck'){ %>

You don't have a Taggbox account? Start with a 30% discount.<% }%>
To publish your content, you need to:
  • Go to Taggbox display, create, customize and publish your social wall.
  • In the "Display" options, choose "Digital Signage" and then <% if(window.whitelabel=='yodeck'){ %>"Yodeck"<% }else{ %>"Other"<%}%>.
  • Copy the provided Display Wall URL and paste it in the "Display Wall URL" field in the app.

meta.name: PosterMyWall
meta.details:
Display menus, promotional material or any other content from your PosterMyWall account by providing the <% if(window.whitelabel == 'yodeck'){%>iframe<%}%> link.<% if(window.whitelabel =='yodeck'){%>
See the detailed guide for more.<%}%>
Notes: PosterMyWall is a 3rd-party service that provides you with templates and customization tools to create visual content.
To publish your content, you need to:
  • Go to PosterMyWall, choose, edit and publish your design.
  • In the "publish" options, choose "Digital Signage" and then <% if(window.whitelabel =='yodeck'){%>"Yodeck"<%}else{%>"Play on Smart TV"<%}%>.
  • Copy the provided <% if(window.whitelabel=='yodeck'){ %>iframe<% } %> link and paste it in the "PosterMyWall" field in the app.
meta.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.113 Safari/537.36

code.title: <% if(window.whitelabel =='yodeck'){%> PosterMyWall iframe link <%}else{%> PosteMyWall link <%}%>
code.help:
You can find the <% if(window.whitelabel == 'yodeck'){%>iframe<%}%> link at postermywall.com when you publish your design, by choosing "Digital Signage" and then <% if(window.whitelabel == 'yodeck'){%>"Yodeck"<%}else{%>"Play on Smart TV"<%}%>.<% if(window.whitelabel =='yodeck'){%>
For more details, check our guide.<%}%>
Note: In case of video, it is recommended to download the video from PosterMyWall and then upload and use it as media in your <% if(window.whitelabel == 'yodeck'){%>Yodeck<%}%> account.

meta.name: BBC
meta.details: Show an RSS feed from the news site on your screens. All images and emojis are also displayed, while you can choose from many different text sizes and colors so it fits the rest of your content’s color scheme.

display_image.title: Display Post Image
display_image.help: When disabled, only the text of the RSS feeds will be displayed.

show_logo.title: Show news logo
show_logo.help: When enabled, the news logo will be displayed instead of the post image.

slide_duration.help: Time (in seconds) to change the news post
slide_duration.title: Post Duration

number_of_slides.help: Set a maximum number of news to show
number_of_slides.title: Number of Posts

style.title: Style
style.help:
Default's style values:
Font size: Auto
Title: Black
Description: Gray
Background: White
